title.rendered: “Strategic Elimination of Key Hamas Figures: Ahmed Eliakobi and Iman Rantisi, by IDF and Shin Bet Joint Operation”

content.rendered:
Joint message to the IDF spokesperson and the Shin Bet spokesperson:

Following the intelligence guidance of Shin Bet and AMAN, an aircraft eliminated earlier today in the Rafah area, Ahmed Eliakobi, a Hamas activist who was responsible for the security arrangements of senior Hamas officials and served as a senior manager in the network of the Rafah district.
In addition, Iman Rantisi, a military activist and senior in the investigations department of Hamas’s general security, was also killed. Another officer in the network of the Rafah district was killed.

Attached is the documentation of the elimination: https://bit.ly/3utK5lM
